product_name: CatEye HL-EL135 Front / Omni 3 Rear Bike Light Set
long_description: The economical CatEye HL-EL135 Front / Omni 3 Rear Bike Light Set alerts others to your presence, using both front and rear lights, when you're biking in less than full sunshine.
short_description: The economical CatEye HL-EL135 Front / Omni 3 Rear Bike Light Set alerts others to your presence, using both front and rear lights, when you're biking in less than full sunshine.
